stepTitle: A ball is thrown vertically upward from the ground with an initial velocity of 122 $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$. Use the quadratic function $$h(t)=-16t^2+122t$$ to find how long it will take for the ball to reach its maximum height, and then find the maximum height.
stepBody: Enter your answer as (x,y) where x is the time that arrow reaches its maximum height and y is the maximum height.
